changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE maintenance_request ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, startDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, state VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, idEquipment INTEGER NOT NULL, defectDescription VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, idClient INTEGER NOT NULL, rejectionReason VARCHAR(255), budgetPrice DECIMAL(10,2), paymentDate TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (idEquipment) REFERENCES equipment(id), FOREIGN KEY (idClient) REFERENCES client(id) );
